verses.verse: How the city <WH5892> sits <WH3427> solitary, <WH910> that was full <WH7227> of people! <WH5971> She has become as a widow, <WH490> who was great <WH7227> among the nations! <WH1471> She who was a princess <WH8282> among the provinces <WH4082> has become tributary! <WH4522>

She weeps <WH1058> bitterly <WH1058> in the night, <WH3915> and her tears <WH1832> are on her cheeks; <WH3895> among all her lovers <WH157> she has none to comfort <WH5162> her: <WH7453> All her friends have dealt treacherously <WH898> with her; <WH341> they are become her enemies.

Judah <WH3063> is gone into captivity <WH1540> because of affliction, <WH6040> and because of great <WH7230> servitude; <WH5656> she dwells <WH3427> among the nations, <WH1471> she finds <WH4672> no rest: <WH4494> all her persecutors <WH7291> overtook <WH5381> her within the straits. <WH4712>

The ways <WH1870> of Zion <WH6726> do mourn, <WH57> because none come <WH935> to the solemn assembly; <WH4150> all her gates <WH8179> are desolate, <WH8074> her priests <WH3548> do sigh: <WH584> her virgins <WH1330> are afflicted, <WH3013> and she herself is in bitterness. <WH4843>

Her adversaries <WH6862> are become the head, <WH7218> her enemies <WH341> prosper; <WH7951> for Yahweh <WH3068> has afflicted <WH3013> her for the multitude <WH7230> of her transgressions: <WH6588> her young children <WH5768> are gone <WH1980> into captivity <WH7628> before <WH6440> the adversary. <WH6862>

From the daughter <WH1323> of Zion <WH6726> all her majesty <WH1926> is departed: <WH3318> her princes <WH8269> are become like harts <WH354> that find <WH4672> no pasture, <WH4829> they are gone <WH3212> without strength <WH3581> before <WH6440> the pursuer. <WH7291>

Jerusalem <WH3389> remembers <WH2142> in the days <WH3117> of her affliction <WH6040> and of her miseries <WH4788> all her pleasant things <WH4262> that were from the days <WH3117> of old: <WH6924> when her people <WH5971> fell <WH5307> into the hand <WH3027> of the adversary, <WH6862> and no one helped <WH5826> her, <WH6862> The adversaries saw <WH7200> her, <WH7832> they mocked at her desolations. <WH4868>

Jerusalem <WH3389> has grievously <WH2399> sinned; <WH2398> therefore she has become <WH5206> as an unclean thing; <WH3513> all who honored her despise <WH2107> her, <WH7200> because they have seen her nakedness: <WH6172> yes, <WH584> she sighs, and turns <WH7725> backward. <WH268>

Her filthiness <WH2932> was in her skirts; <WH7757> she didn't <WH2142> remember her latter end; <WH319> therefore is she come down <WH3381> wonderfully; <WH6382> she has no comforter: <WH5162> see, <WH7200> Yahweh, <WH3068> my affliction; <WH6040> for the enemy <WH341> has magnified himself. <WH1431>

The adversary <WH6862> has spread out <WH6566> his hand <WH3027> on all her pleasant things: <WH4261> for she has seen <WH7200> that the nations <WH1471> are entered <WH935> into her sanctuary, <WH4720> concerning whom you commanded <WH6680> that they should not enter <WH935> into your assembly. <WH6951>

All her people <WH5971> sigh, <WH584> they seek <WH1245> bread; <WH3899> they have given <WH5414> their pleasant things <WH4261> for food <WH400> to refresh <WH7725> the soul: <WH5315> look, <WH7200> Yahweh, <WH3068> and see; <WH7200> for I am become abject. <WH2151>

Is it nothing to you, <WH5674> all you who pass by? <WH1870> Look, <WH5027> and see <WH7200> if there is <WH3426> any sorrow <WH4341> like my sorrow, <WH4341> which is brought <WH5953> on me, <WH3068> With which Yahweh has afflicted <WH3013> me in the day <WH3117> of his fierce <WH2740> anger. <WH639>

From on high <WH4791> has he sent <WH7971> fire <WH784> into my bones, <WH6106> and it prevails <WH7287> against them; <WH6566> He has spread a net <WH7568> for my feet, <WH7272> he has turned <WH7725> me back: <WH268> He has made <WH5414> me desolate <WH8074> and faint <WH1739> all the day. <WH3117>

The yoke <WH5923> of my transgressions <WH6588> is bound <WH8244> by his hand; <WH3027> They are knit <WH8276> together, <WH5927> they have come up on my neck; <WH6677> he has made my strength <WH3581> to fail: <WH3782> The Lord <WH136> has delivered <WH5414> me into their hands, <WH3027> against whom I am not able <WH3201> to stand. <WH6965>

The Lord <WH136> has set at nothing <WH5541> all my mighty <WH47> men in the midst <WH7130> of me; <WH7121> He has called a solemn assembly <WH4150> against me to crush <WH7665> my young men: <WH970> The Lord <WH136> has trodden <WH1869> as in a winepress <WH1660> the virgin <WH1330> daughter <WH1323> of Judah. <WH3063>

For these things I weep; <WH1058> my eye, <WH5869> my eye <WH5869> runs down <WH3381> with water; <WH4325> Because the comforter <WH5162> who should refresh <WH7725> my soul <WH5315> is far <WH7368> from me: <WH1121> My children are desolate, <WH8074> because the enemy <WH341> has prevailed. <WH1396>

Zion <WH6726> spreads forth <WH6566> her hands; <WH3027> there is none to comfort <WH5162> her; <WH3068> Yahweh has commanded <WH6680> concerning Jacob, <WH3290> that those who are around <WH5439> him should be his adversaries: <WH6862> Jerusalem <WH3389> is among them as an unclean thing. <WH5079>

Yahweh <WH3068> is righteous; <WH6662> for I have rebelled <WH4784> against his commandment: <WH6310> Please hear <WH8085> all you peoples, <WH5971> and see <WH7200> my sorrow: <WH4341> My virgins <WH1330> and my young men <WH970> are gone <WH1980> into captivity. <WH7628>

I called <WH7121> for my lovers, <WH157> but they deceived <WH7411> me: <WH3548> My priests and my elders <WH2205> gave up the spirit <WH1478> in the city, <WH5892> While they sought <WH1245> them food <WH400> to refresh <WH7725> their souls. <WH5315>

See, <WH7200> Yahweh; <WH3068> for I am in distress; <WH6887> my heart <WH4578> is troubled; <WH2560> My heart <WH3820> is turned <WH2015> within <WH7130> me; <WH4784> for I have grievously rebelled: <WH4784> Abroad <WH2351> the sword <WH2719> bereaves, <WH7921> at home <WH1004> there is as death. <WH4194>

They have heard <WH8085> that I sigh; <WH584> there is none to comfort <WH5162> me; <WH341> All my enemies have heard <WH8085> of my trouble; <WH7451> they are glad <WH7797> that you have done <WH6213> it: <WH935> You will bring the day <WH3117> that you have proclaimed, <WH7121> and they shall be like me. <WH3644>

Let all their wickedness <WH7451> come <WH935> before <WH6440> you; <WH5953> Do to them, <WH5953> as you have done to me for all my transgressions: <WH6588> For my sighs <WH585> are many, <WH7227> and my heart <WH3820> is faint. <WH1742>
